title: Fatima Nour was assigned to Internal Security
subtitle: Fatima Nour, a Muslim woman born abroad, worked for the Department of National Security but was not appointed by President Obama to be the assistant director of the United States. Nationality and immigration.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: President Obama Fatima Noor was appointed President of the United States. Citizenship and immigration services in the Ministry of Internal Security.
